name: PAS_TRIAGE_HX
description: The triage history for the referral record.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAS_TRIAGE_HX_DEC_C_NAME
columns.description: Referral triage history - triage decision

columns.name: PAS_TRIAGE_HX_PRI_C_NAME
columns.description: Referral triage history - priority

columns.name: PAS_TRI_RJCT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Referral triage history - reject reason

columns.name: PAS_TRI_RD_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description: Referral triage history - redirect specialty

columns.name: PAS_TRI_HX_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: PAS_TRI_HX_SITE_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.

columns.name: PAS_TRI_HX_APPT_CMT
columns.description: Referral triage information - appointment change comments

columns.name: PAS_TRI_HX_PW_UPG_YN
columns.description: Referral triage history - pathway upgrade request history

columns.name: PAS_TRI_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: Referral triage history - user

columns.name: PAS_TRI_HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PAS_TRI_HX_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Referral triage history - instant of update

columns.name: PAS_TRI_HX_FREE_PX
columns.description: Referral triage history - free text procedures

columns.name: PAS_TRI_HX_FREE_DX
columns.description: PAS TRIAGE HISTORY - FREE TEXT DIAGNOSES

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_RFL_DX_ID_DX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the diagnosis.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_ENC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: History item to track changes made to encounter type during triage.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_PACKAGE_TYPE_ID_EPISODE_DEF_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the name of the episode / block definition record.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_TREATMENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: History item to track changes made to treatment type during triage.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_RESP_LOC_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_PHASE_C_NAME
columns.description: History item to track changes made to referral phase during referral triage

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_RESP_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_RESP_DEP_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_RFL_DX_TXT
columns.description: History item to track changes made to free text associated with referral diagnoses during triage.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_REMIND_DATE
columns.description: An audit of when the user asked to be reminded of this referral.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_RECPNT_C_NAME
columns.description: An audit of who a request for more information went to.

columns.name: PAS_TRI_RD_DEP_C_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.

columns.name: PAS_TRI_RD_PROVSP_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores which provider specialty the patient was redirected to in triage

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_UNACCEPT_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Triage history item to track changes made to unaccept reason during referral triage.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_COND_GRP_C_NAME
columns.description: Referral Triage History - Condition Group.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_RIGHT_TO_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: Referral Triage History - Right To Healthcare.

columns.name: TRIAGE_HX_RSLT_INIT_ASMT_C_NAME
columns.description: Referral Triage History - Result of Initial Assessment
